net.antidot.paf

Class Filter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.antidot.paf.Filter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeneratorFilter, ProcessorFilter, VisitorFilter

    public abstract class Filter
extends Object
    This class represents a Filter and can extended to define a complex filter. For simple filter, you can use pre-defined specialization of this class:
    • GeneratorFilter
    • ProcessorFilter
    • VisitorFilter
    Any extend of this class inherit the two fields configuration and handle, which can be used to read its configuration and communicate with the PaF respectively.
    Version:
    7.4
    Author:
    Laurent Mazuel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Configuration configuration
      The configuration of this filter.
      protected Handle handle
      The handle to the PaF

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void generate()
      The filter method, which can be used to generate documents.
      abstract void init()
      The init method, which will be called one time at the beginning of the filter.
      abstract int work()
      The work method during the PaF life.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public abstract void init()
                   throws Exception
        The init method, which will be called one time at the beginning of the filter. At this step, the Scheduler will be not ready to give document to filters whith the Handle.receive() method. The main purpose of this method if to initialize the filter. Then, it is the best place to use the inherited configuration instance to set the correct state of the filter.
        Throws:
        Exception - Allows developers to rise Exception instance

      • generate

        public abstract void generate()
                       throws Exception
        The filter method, which can be used to generate documents. The PaF will only exist if all the generate methods of all filters have existed their generate() method. Be careful of blocking this method.
        Throws:
        Exception - Allows developers to rise Exception instance

      • work

        public abstract int work()
                  throws Exception
        The work method during the PaF life.
        Returns:
        the return code of the application.
        Throws:
        Exception - Allows developers to rise Exception instance
